about_the_game:
DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

Excavator Movement

You have total control over your excavator that mimic the real thing. The realistic movement dynamics will make you feel as like you're operating heavy machinery. Every motion, including arm swings, was created to provide a genuine and enjoyable experience.

Refined Player Control

Our new Refined Player Control system now supports three control types—SAE, ISO, and Easy Mode—catering to both seasoned operators and newcomers. Additionally, enjoy the flexibility of adjustable seating for a more immersive and personalized experience. Take command with enhanced precision and comfort as you tackle every excavation task with confidence.

VR Joystick Control

Navigate your excavator effortlessly using the VR joystick, bringing a new level of immersion and control to your excavation experience.

Excavation Tasks

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully maneuver your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR Only, Valve index controllers

short_description: DiggerSim - Virtual reality Excavator & Heavy Equipment Simulator
